data_tracked_description: Only chat Gpt, but this plugins doesn't store any data
description:
IA Auto Complete - Smart Text Suggestions

Transform any text input in your Bubble app with intelligent, context-aware auto-completion powered by GPT technology.

Demo here : http://plugindev-43171.bubbleapps.io/version-test/iaautocomplete

‚Ä¢ Real-time suggestions as you type
‚Ä¢ Context-aware completions based on your custom prompts
‚Ä¢ Adaptive style matching with user input
‚Ä¢ Customizable suggestion parameters
‚Ä¢ Modern, responsive UI with smooth animations

üõ†Ô∏è Technical Highlights:
‚Ä¢ Debounced input handling (500ms)
‚Ä¢ Efficient API usage

‚Ä¢ Token usage tracking

üí° Perfect Use Cases:

name: AI input wizard (autocomplete)
plugin_instructions:
Quick Start Guide:

1. Initial Setup
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Add your OpenAI API key in the plugin settings
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Configure your context prompt
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Set desired parameters (suggestions count, length, etc.)

2. Basic Implementation
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Drag the element onto your page
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Connect to your workflow
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Start typing to see suggestions

3. Advanced Configuration
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Customize suggestion parameters:
      - Number of suggestions (1-5)
      - Minimum characters to trigger (default: 3)
      - Suggestion length (characters)
      - Response delay (default: 500ms)

4. Styling Options
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Matches your app's design
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Customizable suggestion display
   ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Responsive layout support

Need help? Check our documentation or contact support!
